About.title: Lost and Found
About.description: Learn more about the 'Lost and Found' app, its goals, and the team.
About.aboutDescription: — is a convenient app for finding and posting lost or found items.
About.aboutDescription_2: We strive to create a community where anyone can quickly return a lost item to its owner or report a find.
About.aboutDescription_3: The project was developed from scratch as a pet project and is currently in active development. We are constantly improving the interface and adding new features.
About.aboutDescription_4: Do you want a similar app?
About.aboutDescription_5: I am open to offers! If you need a similar app for your project or business — contact me at:
